law.text: The Division of Postal Services shall operate the centralized postal services for executive branch agencies as set forth in KRS 12.020. The division shall operate at a central location with additional locations necessary to maintain and improve service levels.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 23, effective June 25, 2009. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 10, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 15, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 508, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 24, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 51, effective June 17, 1978.
